alert.note: Alert for Baltimore; Baltimore City (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 3:25PM EDT until July 16 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northern Maryland, including the following county: Baltimore and Baltimore City. * WHEN...Until 630 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 325 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Baltimore... Pikesville... Towson... Catonsville... Woodlawn... Randallstown... Parkville... Owings Mills... Eldersburg... Milford Mill... Reisterstown... Lochearn... Arbutus... Mays Chapel... Lutherville-Timonium... Garrison... Lutherville... Stevenson... Mcdonogh... Brooklandville... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
